# @cybersailor/slauth-ui-vue

> Vue 3 UI component library for Slauth authentication

Key features:
- Pre-built authentication UI components
- Email/Password, OAuth, Magic Link, Password Recovery
- Dark/Light theme support with customizable styling
- Vue 3 Composition API with TypeScript support
- Responsive design and accessibility

## Quick Start

- [Installation & Setup](https://github.com/thecybersailor/slauth/tree/main/packages/slauth-ui-vue#installation): NPM installation and plugin configuration
- [README](https://github.com/thecybersailor/slauth/tree/main/packages/slauth-ui-vue#readme): Package overview and basic usage
- [Demo Application](https://github.com/thecybersailor/slauth/tree/main/packages/demo-fe): Live example with all components

## Components

- [Main Components](https://github.com/thecybersailor/slauth/blob/main/packages/slauth-ui-vue/docs/components.md): Auth, SignIn, SignUp, VerifyOtp, ForgotPassword, UpdatePassword
- [User Management](https://github.com/thecybersailor/slauth/blob/main/packages/slauth-ui-vue/docs/user-management.md): UserDashboard, UserProfile, MFA, Sessions, Security
- [Admin Components](https://github.com/thecybersailor/slauth/blob/main/packages/slauth-ui-vue/docs/admin-components.md): Admin layout, user management, system stats
- [UI Components](https://github.com/thecybersailor/slauth/tree/main/packages/slauth-ui-vue/src/components/ui): Button, Input, Dialog, Table, etc

## Composables

- [Composables Reference](https://github.com/thecybersailor/slauth/blob/main/packages/slauth-ui-vue/docs/composables.md): useAuth, useAuthContext, useOAuthSignIn, etc
- [Source Code](https://github.com/thecybersailor/slauth/tree/main/packages/slauth-ui-vue/src/composables): Browse composables implementation

## Styling & Theming

- [Theme Customization](https://github.com/thecybersailor/slauth/tree/main/packages/slauth-ui-vue#styling): CSS variables and theme configuration
- [OAuth Button Styles](https://github.com/thecybersailor/slauth/blob/main/packages/slauth-ui-vue/src/composables/useOAuthButtonStyles.ts): Social login button styling

## Optional

- [NPM Package](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@cybersailor/slauth-ui-vue): Published package on NPM registry
- [Source Code](https://github.com/thecybersailor/slauth/tree/main/packages/slauth-ui-vue/src): Browse Vue component source files
- [Localization](https://github.com/thecybersailor/slauth/tree/main/packages/slauth-ui-vue/src/localization): Internationalization support
